decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): 513-A01 rev C (proposed elevations)

513-A02 rev B (proposed ground floor plan); 513-A03 rev B (proposed first floor and loft floor plan); 513-A04 rev B (proposed roof plan, elevation and section 2); 513-A05 rev A (proposed sections 1&3)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match those of the existing building unless indicated on the approved plans or application form. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), London Plan(2021) policies D3, D4 and HC1 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021); and the Hanger Hill (Haymills) Conservation Area Managerment Plan.
| The proposed front roof lights shall be of the non-projecting Conservation Area type and shall be installed flush with the plane of the roof and shall be retained as such thereafter.

Reason: In the interests of ensuring a high quality of design that preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Hanger HIll (Haymills) Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and London Plan(2021) policies D3 D4 and HC1.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Two storey side/rear extension,including conversion of garage to habitable room and replacement of garage door; roof extension to rear roof slope; and installation of three roof lights to main side roof slopes
